channel.title: Watch New movies/tv shows (heroes lost etc..free)
channel.description: Too antisocial to go to Cinema? Can't afford it, well a site i found is excellent for movies, www.vid-stream.com. I think its fastish and supplies good quality films (free of course) =] Oh and series like Heroes, Lost etc can be watched on it :) And for those South Park fanatics, http://www.southparkzone.com/ is where you want. Why i'm mentioning these? Took me ages to find a decent site to watch movies/old tv series on and some people may be interested in watching these things :)
